short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A more powerful way to search though GrayJay games

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension adds a referee search function to the GrayJay games page. It allows officials to search and see what games their peers are involved in, and view who is officiating a game by hovering over the referee icon rather than opening the link to the actual game. 

This is an open source project which can be accessed on GitHub at ldhwaddell/grayjay-search.
